quote: I have lunch with someone almost every day of the week, either past clients or trusted advisors.
why_clipworthy: Demonstrates a specific, actionable strategy for maintaining and building relationships.
suggested_hook: Want to know how top agents keep their referral pipeline full? It starts with lunch.

quote: We are going to be fine. Focus on listings and learning.
why_clipworthy: Provides reassurance and a proactive strategy during uncertain market conditions.
suggested_hook: Feeling uncertain about the market? Here's why you shouldn't worry.
